@notice Constructor
 @param _uniRouterAddress Address of Uniswap style router
@notice Distributes earnings and reinvests remainder into Want token

@notice Takes earnings and distributes fees, buyback, revshare etc.
 @return remainingEarnings The remaining earnings after all fees and fund distribution

@notice Sends the specified earnings amount as revenue share to ZOR stakers
 @param _amount The amount of Earn token to share as revenue with ZOR stakers

@notice Abstract function to convert remaining earn token to Want.
 @dev To be implemented by child contracts

exitPool(uint256,uint256,address,(addres.details: NOTE: Requires caller to approve want token spending

params._amountLP: The amount of LP (Want) tokens to remove
params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed for swaps. 1000 = 0 %, 995 = 0.5%, etc.
params._recipient: The recipient of the underlying tokens at pool exit

joinPool(address,address,uint256,uint256.details: NOTE: Requires spending approval by caller

params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed for swaps. 1000 = 0 %, 995 = 0.5%, etc.
params._recipient: The recipient of the LP token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._path: The swap path to be reversed

safeSwap((uint256,uint256,uint256,addres.details: NOTE: Caller must approve tokens for spending beforehand

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

distributeAndReinvestEarnings(uint256,ui.notice: Distributes earnings and reinvests remainder into Want token

exitPool(uint256,uint256,address,(addres.notice: Removes liquidity from a pool and sends tokens back to this address

joinPool(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Adds liquidity to the pool of this contract

reversePath(address[]).notice: Gets the swap path in the opposite direction of a trade

safeSwap((uint256,uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Safely swaps tokens using the most suitable protocol based on token
